<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b0c982a547320110a06c690cd36d4390</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>want_to_request_controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading) {
		g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
        return;
    }

        g_form.setValue("requested_for", null);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", false);
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);
	
    if (newValue == 'myself') {
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", g_user.userID);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", true);
    
    } else if (newValue == 'direct_report' || newValue == '') {
		
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);	
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>want_to_request_controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-17 22:18:03</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", true);
	g_form.setMandatory("attachments", true);

	g_form.setValue("date_du_co_proj", "");
	g_form.setValue("nom_du_directeur", "");	
    g_form.setMandatory("attachments", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("attachments", false);
	g_form.setValue("attachments", "");
	}
}

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:994d6354477a0110a06c690cd36d4355</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>adhocControls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading) {
      g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", false);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", false);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", false);
    g_form.setMandatory("attachments", false);   
    g_form.setDisplay("attachments", false);  
        return;
    }

    if (newValue == 'ad_hoc') {
     g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", true);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", true);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", true);
	g_form.setMandatory("attachments", true);   
    g_form.setDisplay("attachments", true);

    } else {
    g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", false);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", false);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", false);
    g_form.setMandatory("attachments", false);   
    g_form.setDisplay("attachments", false);
     g_form.setValue("nom_du_projet", "");
	g_form.setValue("date_souhait_e", "");
	g_form.setValue("date_du_co_proj", "");
	g_form.setValue("nom_du_directeur", "");
    g_form.setMandatory("attachments", false);   
    g_form.setDisplay("attachments", false);
	g_form.setValue("attachments", "");			
	}
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-14 23:00:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>100bb1d447230110a06c690cd36d4385</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>adhocControls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_100bb1d447230110a06c690cd36d4385</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-20 00:15:12</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_34d514f347330110a06c690cd36d4376
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Access controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('RequestAsControls');

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getAnswers');

    ga.getXML(callback);

}

function callback(response) {

    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
	answer = JSON.parse(answer);

    if (!answer.as_manager && !answer.as_team) {
        g_form.removeOption("type_of_request", "delegate_request");
    }
    if (!answer.as_direct) {
        g_form.removeOption("type_of_request", "exceptional_request");
    }
    if (!answer.as_operator) {
        g_form.removeOption("type_of_request", "specific_request");
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-06 22:53:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>34d514f347330110a06c690cd36d4376</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Access controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_34d514f347330110a06c690cd36d4376</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-06 23:11:52</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:015ce314477a0110a06c690cd36d439a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>infoItemControls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading) {
        return;
    }

    g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);


    if (newValue == 'employee_request' || newValue == 'delegate_request') {

        g_form.clearOptions("request_subtype");
        addAll();
        g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", "ad_hoc");
        g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");

    } else if (newValue == 'specific_request') {

        g_form.clearOptions("request_subtype");
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "", "");
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "ad_hoc", "Ad hoc");
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "standard", "Standard");
        g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");

    } else if (newValue == 'exceptional_request' || newValue == 'quotation_request') {

        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");


    } else if (newValue == '') {
        g_form.clearOptions("request_subtype");
        addAll();
        g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");
    }
}

function addAll() {
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "", "");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "ad_hoc", "Ad hoc");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "astreinte", "Astreinte");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "facture", "Factur");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "bcp", "BCP");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "pret", "Prt");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "standard", "Standard");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "perte", "Perte");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "vol", "Vol");
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-08 00:47:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>41</sys_mod_count><sys_name>infoItemControls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-21 00:21:57</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_806faa4947b30110a06c690cd36d4384
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_gamme</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>unique field for correlation id</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');
	gamme.addQuery('correlation_id', current.correlation_id);
	gamme.addQuery('sys_id', '!=', current.getUniqueValue());
	gamme.query();
	if (gamme.getRowCount() > 0) {
		gs.addErrorMessage("Correlation id "+current.correlation_id+" is already exist");
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-29 21:07:14</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>806faa4947b30110a06c690cd36d4384</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>unique field for correlation id</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_806faa4947b30110a06c690cd36d4384</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-29 21:11:12</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=806faa4947b30110a06c690cd36d4384"/></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sys_dictionary</collection><condition>current.unique.changes();</condition><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>SNC Create Unique Index</name><order>100</order><priority/><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[var tableName = current.getValue('name');
var elementName = current.getValue('element');

var success = gs.ensureIndex(tableName, elementName);
if (!success) {
  var reset = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
  reset.get(current.sys_id.toString());
  reset.unique = false;
  reset.setWorkflow(false);
  reset.update();
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2006-02-16 06:26:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>7189f9f1c0a8016601ea8dbd3a092a0b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNC Create Unique Index</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">46ad9e22a5300110c0a0e1db2cdc95f4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7189f9f1c0a8016601ea8dbd3a092a0b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-29 21:11:35</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7189f9f1c0a8016601ea8dbd3a092a0b"/></record_update>

    var ga = new GlideAjax('GammeFilter');

    ga.getXML(updateField);
}

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_9ae50d9047030110a06c690cd36d43a8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GammeFilter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GammeFilter</name><script><![CDATA[var GammeFilter = Class.create();
GammeFilter.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getArticles: function() {
		
        var item_id = this.getParameter('item_id');
		
		if(item_id)
		gs.setProperty("item_id", item_id);
		
		return "u_purchase_family.u_catalog_item="+gs.getProperty("item_id");
	
	},
    type: 'GammeFilter'
});

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_94eb066947320110a06c690cd36d430d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.requestedForControls</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>requestedForControls</name><script><![CDATA[var requestedForControls = Class.create();
requestedForControls.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getUsers: function(cur) {

        var choice = cur.variables.i_want_to_request_this.toString();

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.get(gs.getUserID());
		
        if (choice == "manager") {
            return "manager=" + gr.sys_id+"^active=true";
        }
		
		if (choice == "direct_report") {
            return "sys_id="+gr.u_report_to+"^ORmanager="+gr.u_report_to+"^active=true";
        }
		
		if (choice == "team_leader") {
            return "u_team_leader="+gr.sys_id+"^active=true";
        }

        if (choice == "myself") {
            return "sys_id=" + gr.sys_id;
        } else {
            return "sys_id!=" + gr.sys_id +"^active=true";
        }

    },
    type: 'requestedForControls'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:39:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>94eb066947320110a06c690cd36d430d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>requestedForControls</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_94eb066947320110a06c690cd36d430d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-08 00:52:36</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b0c982a547320110a06c690cd36d4390</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>want_to_request_controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading) {
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
        return;
    }

    g_form.setValue("requested_for", null);
    g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", false);
    g_form.setMandatory("requested_for", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("requested_for", true);
    g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);
    g_form.setValue("request_subtype", '');

    if (newValue == 'myself') {
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", g_user.userID);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", true);

    } else if (newValue == 'direct_report' || newValue == '') {

        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);

    } else if (newValue == 'operator') {
        g_form.setMandatory("requested_for", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("requested_for", false);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>18</sys_mod_count><sys_name>want_to_request_controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-08 00:57:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b1186fdf47730110a06c690cd36d43ab
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RequestAsControls</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>RequestAsControls</name><script><![CDATA[var RequestAsControls = Class.create();
RequestAsControls.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getAnswers: function() {

        var answer = {
            as_manager: false,
            as_operator: false,
            as_team: false,
			as_direct: false
        };

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.get(gs.getUserID());

        if (gr.u_report_to != "") {
            answer.as_direct = true;
        }

        gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.query();

        while (gr.next()) {

            if (gr.manager == gs.getUserID()) {
                answer.as_manager = true;
            }
            if (gr.u_team_leader == gs.getUserID()) {
                answer.as_team = true;
            }
            if (answer.as_manager && answer.as_team)
                break;
        }

        gr = new GlideRecord('u_purchase_family');
        gr.get('24ef160c477a4110a06c690cd36d43d6');
		
        var family_approvals = gr.u_family_approvals;

        gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', family_approvals);

        gr.query();

        while (gr.next()) {
            if (gr.manager == gs.getUserID()) {
                answer.as_operator = true;
            }

            if (answer.as_operator)
                break;
        }

        return JSON.stringify(answer);
    },
    type: 'RequestAsControls'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-06 00:59:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>b1186fdf47730110a06c690cd36d43ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RequestAsControls</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b1186fdf47730110a06c690cd36d43ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-06 01:36:49</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_c8f9b34e47c70110a06c690cd36d4375
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>saveGlobalForm&accessControl</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    this.parent_form = g_form;
	
    var ga = new GlideAjax('RequestAsControls');

    g_form.setDisabled("i_want_to_request_this", true);

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getAnswers');

    ga.getXML(callback);

}

function callback(response) {

    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
	answer = JSON.parse(answer);

    if (!answer.as_manager) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "manager");
    }
    if (!answer.as_direct) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "direct_report");
    }
    if (!answer.as_team) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "team_leader");
    }
    if (!answer.as_operator) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "operator");
    }

    g_form.setDisabled("i_want_to_request_this", false);

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 22:11:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c8f9b34e47c70110a06c690cd36d4375</sys_id><sys_mod_count>22</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveGlobalForm&accessControl</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c8f9b34e47c70110a06c690cd36d4375</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-06 01:46:28</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: customc@import "https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/4.7.0/css/font-awesome.min.css"; .simple { background-color: #548472; display: flex; box-shadow: 0px 0px 0px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.1); justify-content: space-around; } .logo_sec{ padding-top: 2px; } .logo { height: 50px; width: 50%; } .copyright{ padding-top: 20px; color: white; } ul { display:flex; padding-bottom: 2px; } ul li { list-style: none; } ul li a { position: relative; width:30px; height:30px; display:block; text-align:center; margin: 0 10px; border-radius: 50%; padding: 6px; box-sizing: border-box; text-decoration: none; box-shadow: 0 10px 15px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); background: linear-gradient(0deg, #ddd, #fff); transition: .5s; } ul li a:hover { box-shadow: 0 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); text-decoration: none; } ul li a .fa { width: 100%; height:100%; display:block; background: linear-gradient(0deg, #fff, #ddd); border-radius: 50%; font-size:16px; color: #262626; transition: .5s; } ul li:nth-child(1) a:hover .fa { color: #3b5998; } ul li:nth-child(2) a:hover .fa { color: #00aced; } ul li:nth-child(3) a:hover .fa { color: #dd4b39; } ul li:nth-child(4) a:hover .fa { color: #007bb6; } ul li:nth-child(5) a:hover .fa { color: #e4405f; }sp_instancefalsefalseBrighten Footer truefalsetruesp_header_footeradmin2022-06-05 02:22:23ab61724347730110a06c690cd36d43f272Brighten Footer globalglobalsp_header_footer_ab61724347730110a06c690cd36d43f2admin2022-06-17 19:32:00

var elementName = current.getValue('element');

var success = gs.ensureIndex(tableName, elementName);
if (!success) {
  var reset = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
  reset.get(current.sys_id.toString());
  reset.unique = false;
  reset.setWorkflow(false);
  reset.update();
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>glide.maint</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2006-02-16 06:26:41</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>7189f9f1c0a8016601ea8dbd3a092a0b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>SNC Create Unique Index</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="System (glidesoft)" source="glidesoft">46ad9e22a5300110c0a0e1db2cdc95f4</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_7189f9f1c0a8016601ea8dbd3a092a0b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-28 00:02:04</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=7189f9f1c0a8016601ea8dbd3a092a0b"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b0c982a547320110a06c690cd36d4390</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>want_to_request_controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
	var req_sub_options = initReqSubOptions();
	
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", null);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", false);
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);
	
	for (var i = 0; i < req_sub_options.length; i++) {
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", req_sub_options[i].value, req_sub_options[i].label, i);
    }


    if (newValue == 'myself') {

		g_form.setValue("type_of_request", 'Employee request');
		
        for (i = 0; i < req_sub_options.length; i++) {
			
			if (req_sub_options[i].value === 'Ad hoc')
             g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", req_sub_options[i].label);
            
		}
		
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", g_user.userID);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", true);

    } else if (newValue == 'team_leader' || newValue == 'manager') {

		g_form.setValue("type_of_request", 'Delegate request');
		
        for (i = 0; i < req_sub_options.length; i++) {
			
			if (req_sub_options[i].value === 'Ad hoc')
             g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", req_sub_options[i].label);
            
		}
        

    }  else if (newValue == 'operator') {
		
		g_form.setValue("type_of_request", 'Specific request');
		
        for (i = 0; i < req_sub_options.length; i++) {

            if (req_sub_options[i].value === 'Ad hoc' ||
                req_sub_options[i].value === 'Standard' || req_sub_options[i].value === '')                {
                //
            } else
                g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", req_sub_options[i].label);
        }

    } else if (newValue == 'direct_report') {
		
		g_form.setValue("type_of_request", 'Exceptional request');
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);


    }
}

function initReqSubOptions() {
    return [{
            label: "Astreinte",
            value: "Astreinte"
        },
        {
            label: "Factur",
            value: "Factur"
        },
        {
            label: "BCP",
            value: "BCP"
        },
        {
            label: "Prt",
            value: "Prt"
        },
        {
            label: "Standard",
            value: "Standard"
        },
        {
            label: "Ad hoc",
            value: "Ad hoc"
        },
        {
            label: "Perte",
            value: "Perte"
        },
        {
            label: "Vol",
            value: "Vol"
        }
    ];
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>want_to_request_controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-12 14:23:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b0c982a547320110a06c690cd36d4390</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>want_to_request_controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading) {
        return;
    }

        g_form.setValue("requested_for", null);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", false);
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);
	
    if (newValue == 'myself') {
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", g_user.userID);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", true);
    
    } else if (newValue == 'direct_report' || newValue == '') {
		
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);	
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>want_to_request_controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-17 21:45:59</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:015ce314477a0110a06c690cd36d439a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>infoItemControls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        g_form.setValue("type_of_request", "");
        return;
    }

    var options = initOptions();

    g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);

    for (var i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", options[i].value, options[i].label, i);
    }

    if (newValue == 'employee_request' || newValue == 'delegate_request') {

        for (i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {

            if (options[i].value === 'ad_hoc') {
                g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", options[i].value);
            }
        }

    } else if (newValue == 'specific_request') {

        for (i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {

            if (options[i].value === 'ad_hoc' ||
                options[i].value === 'standard') {
                // nothing
            } else
                g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", options[i].value);

        }
    } else if (newValue == 'exceptional_request' || newValue == 'quotation_request') {
        g_form.clearOptions("request_subtype");
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
    }
}

function initOptions() {
    return [{
            label: "Astreinte",
            value: "astreint"
        },
        {
            label: "Factur",
            value: "facture"
        },
        {
            label: "BCP",
            value: "bcp"
        },
        {
            label: "Prt",
            value: "pret"
        },
        {
            label: "Standard",
            value: "standard"
        },
        {
            label: "Ad hoc",
            value: "ad_hoc"
        },
        {
            label: "Perte",
            value: "perte"
        },
        {
            label: "Vol",
            value: "vol"
        }
    ];
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-08 00:47:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>infoItemControls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-08 00:57:02</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b0c982a547320110a06c690cd36d4390</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>want_to_request_controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }
	
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", null);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", false);
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);
	
    if (newValue == 'myself') {
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", g_user.userID);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", true);
    
    } else if (newValue == 'direct_report') {
		
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>want_to_request_controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-14 17:15:08</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_theme_a7a6e78277002300a6e592718a10617a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_theme"><sp_theme action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css_variables>// Grays
$gray-base: #000000;
$gray-dark: lighten($gray-base, 18.04%);
$gray-darker: lighten($gray-base, 8.24%);
$gray-light: lighten($gray-base, 40%);
$gray-lighter: lighten($gray-base, 94.51%);
$gray: lighten($gray-base, 29.02%);

////// Branding variables //////
// should always end with !default and no other variable should have !default
$brand-primary: #1F8476 !default;
$body-bg: #ffffff !default;
$brand-success: #48C891 !default;
$state-success-text: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-success, 3), 15.64%), 34.31) !default;
$sp-navbar-divider-color: #5A7F71 !default;
$text-color: $gray-dark !default;
$navbar-inverse-link-hover-color: #ffffff !default;
$navbar-inverse-bg: #293e40 !default;
$brand-warning: #DFD139 !default;
$brand-danger: #C83C36 !default;
$sp-tagline-color: #ffffff !default;
$navbar-inverse-link-color: #A7B0B2 !default;
$brand-info: #6ABECF !default;
$link-color: $brand-primary !default;
$sp-logo-margin-x: 15px !default;
$text-muted: $gray-light !default;
////////////////////////////////////

// Link hover decoration
$link-hover-decoration: underline !default;

// La Jolla variables
$brand-primary-dark: #1F8476 !default;
$brand-primary-darker: #165C53 !default;
$brand-primary-light: #5FBAA4 !default;
$brand-primary-lighter: #B8E0D7 !default;
$brand-primary-lightest: #EEF8F8 !default;
$dropdown-link-disabled-color: $gray-light;
$link-hover-color: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($link-color, 1), 0.42%), 16.67);
$navbar-inverse-link-active-bg: #213234;
$navbar-inverse-link-hover-bg: $brand-primary;
$panel-primary-border: $brand-primary ;
$panel-primary-heading-bg: $brand-primary ;
$panel-primary-text: #ffffff;
$primary: $brand-primary;
$input-border-focus: #1f8476;
$quicklinks-background: #EDF7F5;
$btn-success-bg: $brand-success;
$btn-default-color: #2e2e2e;
$btn-primary-color: #ffffff;
$btn-primary-bg: $brand-primary;
$btn-primary-border: darken($btn-primary-bg, 5%);
$btn-success-bg: $brand-success;
$btn-success-border: darken($btn-success-bg, 5%);
$btn-success-color: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-success, 3), 15.64%), 34.31);
$component-active-color: $gray;
$component-active-bg: #f5f5f5;
$state-danger-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-danger, 354), 42.52%), 42.94);
$state-danger-border: #C83C36;
$state-danger-text: #64201A;
$state-info-bg: lighten(desaturate($brand-info, 3.27%), 19.02);
$state-info-border: $brand-info;
$state-info-text: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-info, 1), 2.75%), 41.57);
$state-success-bg: lighten(saturate($brand-success, 3.67%), 28.24);
$state-success-border: $brand-success;
$state-warning-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-warning, -3), 17.70%), 29.61);
$state-warning-border: $brand-warning;
$state-warning-text: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-warning, -4), 20.32%), 44.31);
$alert-danger-bg: $state-danger-bg;
$alert-danger-border: $state-danger-border;
$alert-danger-text: $state-danger-text;
$alert-info-bg: $state-info-bg;
$alert-info-border: $state-info-border;
$alert-info-text: $state-info-text;
$alert-success-bg: $state-success-bg;
$alert-success-border: $state-success-border;
$alert-success-text: $state-success-text;
$alert-warning-bg: $state-warning-bg;
$alert-warning-border: $state-warning-border;
$alert-warning-text: $state-warning-text;

// To get service status messages consistent with brand colors
$primary: $brand-primary;
$warning: $brand-warning;
$success: $brand-success;
$info: $brand-info;
$danger: $brand-danger;
$input-border-placeholder: white;


// Service Catalog panel hover highlight
$panel-list-item: lighten(desaturate(adjust-hue($panel-primary-heading-bg, -6), 20.79%), 58.04);
$panel-primary-heading-bg: #47a992;

$multiple-issues-color: #7070B3;
$no-issue-color: lighten($brand-success, 40%);
$planned-maintenance-color: lighten($brand-info, 35%);
$service-degredation-color: lighten($brand-warning, 40%);
$service-outage-color: lighten($brand-danger, 45%);

$no-issue-border-color: $brand-success;
$planned-maintenance-border-color: $brand-info;
$service-degredation-border-color: $brand-warning;
$service-outage-border-color: $brand-danger;

$no-issues-text: $state-success-text;
$planned-maintenance-text: $state-info-text;
$service-degredation-text: $state-info-text;
$service-outage-text: $state-danger-bg;

$login-btn-bg: $btn-primary-bg;
$login-btn-border: $btn-primary-border;

$qa-tag-color: $state-info-text;
$qa-tag-bg: $state-info-bg;
$qa-tag-border: $state-info-bg;
$qa-tag-hover-color: darken($qa-tag-color, 10%);
$qa-tag-hover-bg: darken($qa-tag-bg, 10%);

$qa-thread-tag-color: $state-info-text;
$qa-thread-tag-bg: $state-info-bg;
$qa-thread-tag-hover-color: darken($qa-thread-tag-color, 10%);
$qa-thread-tag-hover-bg: darken($qa-thread-tag-bg, 10%);

$qa-panel-link-color: $link-color;
$select2-container-active: $input-border-focus;

$not-webkit-outline-color: $input-border-focus;
$webkit-outline-color: $input-border-focus;

$label-success-bg: lighten(saturate($brand-success, 3.67%), 28.24);
$label-info-bg: lighten(desaturate($brand-info, 3.27%), 19.02);
$label-warning-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-warning, -3), 17.70%), 29.61);
$label-danger-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-danger, 354), 42.52%), 42.94);
$label-primary-bg : #C83C36;
$data-table-selected: $brand-primary;

$button-selected-color: $btn-primary-bg;
$dropdown-link-active-bg: $brand-primary;
$dropdown-link-active-color: #ffffff;
$widget-editor-fa-bg: $brand-primary;

$input-border-tab-focus: $input-border-focus;

$fav-star-color: darken($brand-warning, 20%);
$fav-star-color-off: #ffffff;
$fav-star-outline-color: #6b611f;
$fav-star-outline: -1px 0 $fav-star-outline-color, 0 1px $fav-star-outline-color, 1px 0$fav-star-outline-color, 0 -1px $fav-star-outline-color;

$sc-field-error-color: #1a424b;
$qa-star-color-on: $brand-warning;
$qa-star-color-off: #ffffff;

$list-group-link-color: $brand-primary;
$list-group-hover-bg: lighten($panel-primary-heading-bg, 40%);

$accessible-placeholder-gray: #565656;




</css_variables><footer display_value="Brighten Footer ">ab61724347730110a06c690cd36d43f2</footer><footer_fixed>true</footer_fixed><header display_value="Stock Header">bf5ec2f2cb10120000f8d856634c9c0c</header><name>La Jolla</name><navbar_fixed>true</navbar_fixed><sys_class_name>sp_theme</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-08-22 16:34:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>a7a6e78277002300a6e592718a10617a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>118</sys_mod_count><sys_name>La Jolla</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal La Jolla Branding" source="com.glide.service-portal.themes.la-jolla">93b26e6aa5b40110c0a0e1db2cdc95e8</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_theme_a7a6e78277002300a6e592718a10617a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-05 02:24:34</sys_updated_on></sp_theme></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_rel_widget_clone"><sp_rel_widget_clone action="DELETE"><child display_value="">7500171f47330110a06c690cd36d4397</child><cloned>2022-06-05 23:07:40</cloned><last_validated>2022-06-05 23:07:40</last_validated><parent display_value="Footer-Instance Security Center">30817eda53502300a699ddeeff7b1215</parent><payload><?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><sp_widget><category>custom</category><client_script><![CDATA[function($scope) {
  /* widget controller */
  var c = this;
	$scope.data.year = new Date().getFullYear(); 
}]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.isc-footer{&#13;
	background-color:#293D40;&#13;
  	padding:5px;&#13;
    color:white;&#13;
}&#13;
&#13;
.isc-footer a:hover{&#13;
	color:white;&#13;
    cursor:pointer;&#13;
}&#13;
.isc-footer a:visited{&#13;
	color:white;&#13;
}</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id>isc_footer</id><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function link(scope, element, attrs, controller) {
  
}]]></link><name>Footer-Instance Security Center</name><option_schema/><public>false</public><roles>admin,security_dashboard_user</roles><script><![CDATA[(function() {
  /* populate the 'data' object */
  /* e.g., data.table = $sp.getValue('table'); */

})();]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><sys_class_name>sp_header_footer</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-09-04 17:35:58</sys_created_on><sys_id>30817eda53502300a699ddeeff7b1215</sys_id><sys_mod_count>19</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Footer-Instance Security Center</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Instance Security Center" source="com.glide.instance_sec_center">92142ea6a5f40110c0a0e1db2cdc9522</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_header_footer_30817eda53502300a699ddeeff7b1215</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-03 22:16:48</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div class="container-fluid isc-footer">
  <div class="row">
    <div class="col-xs-6">
      ${ <span ng-bind-html="::data.year"></span> ServiceNow, Inc. All rights reserved.}
    </div>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_page"><sp_page action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>other</category><css>main.page, main.body {
  min-height: 100%;
  padding-top: 0px !important;
}

@media(max-width: 767px) {
  main.page, main.body {
    height: auto;
  }
}

section.page {
  background-image: url('https://dxc.scene7.com/is/image/dxc/DXC-logo-mosaic:banner_desktop');
  background-position: center center;
  background-size: cover;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-color: #3A3F50;
}

section.page main.body:before {
  display: block;
  background-color: #3A3F50;
  opacity: 0.75;
}</css><draft>false</draft><dynamic_title_structure/><id>landing</id><internal>false</internal><omit_watcher>false</omit_watcher><public>true</public><roles/><seo_script/><short_description/><sys_class_name>sp_page</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2016-02-29 22:51:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>36c61807cb31120000f8d856634c9ca9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>36</sys_mod_count><sys_name>landing</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Service Portal - Core" source="com.glide.service-portal">dc82a6a6a5b40110c0a0e1db2cdc95d2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_page_36c61807cb31120000f8d856634c9ca9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-05 23:01:26</sys_updated_on><title>Service Portal</title><use_seo_script>false</use_seo_script></sp_page><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=36c61807cb31120000f8d856634c9ca9"/><sys_translated_text action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><documentkey>36c61807cb31120000f8d856634c9ca9</documentkey><fieldname>title</fieldname><language>fr</language><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-08 16:00:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>841247e847328110a06c690cd36d4326</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-08 16:00:35</sys_updated_on><tablename>sp_page</tablename><value>Portail de services</value></sys_translated_text></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Cong administratif">6ad9ad1447245110a06c690cd36d4316</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:c26ca1d447245110a06c690cd36d437d</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>date control</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

    if (new Date(newValue) < new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_debut'))) {
        g_form.addErrorMessage("Date de reprise doit etre suprieure  la date de dbut");
        g_form.setValue('date_de_reprise', '');
        g_form.setValue('duree', '');
    } else {
        var delay = new Date(newValue) - new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_debut'));
        delay = delay / (1000 * 3600 * 24);

        if (g_form.getValue('debut') == 1) {
            delay = delay - 0.5;
        }

        if (g_form.getValue('reprise') == 1) {
            delay = delay + 0.5;
        }
        g_form.setValue('duree', delay + ' J');
    }

    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-03 22:44:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cca5dbdc47685110a06c690cd36d43ea</sys_id><sys_mod_count>46</sys_mod_count><sys_name>date control</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_cca5dbdc47685110a06c690cd36d43ea</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-05 00:34:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Cong administratif">6ad9ad1447245110a06c690cd36d4316</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:82ab659447245110a06c690cd36d43ba</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>debut contrl</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading) {
      return;
   }

		var delay = new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_reprise')) - new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_debut'));
        delay = delay / (1000 * 3600 * 24);
	
	var duree = parseFloat(g_form.getValue("duree")); 
	
	if(newValue == 1){
		duree = duree - 0.5;
		g_form.setValue("duree", duree + ' J');
	} else {
		if(g_form.getValue("reprise") == 1)
			delay = delay + 0.5;
		
		g_form.setValue("duree", delay+ ' J');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-04 14:12:24</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>797b622447601110a06c690cd36d43f0</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>debut contrl</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_797b622447601110a06c690cd36d43f0</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-05 00:36:23</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Cong administratif">6ad9ad1447245110a06c690cd36d4316</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:d1cca99447245110a06c690cd36d43cc</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>reprise contrl</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading) {
      return;
   }
	
	var delay = new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_reprise')) - new Date(g_form.getValue('date_de_debut'));
        delay = delay / (1000 * 3600 * 24);
	
	var duree = parseFloat(g_form.getValue("duree")); 
	
	if(newValue == 1){
		duree = duree + 0.5;
		g_form.setValue("duree", duree + ' J');
	} else {
		
		if(g_form.getValue("debut") == 1)
			delay = delay - 0.5;
		
		g_form.setValue("duree", delay+ ' J');
	}

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-04 14:02:45</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c5182e2047601110a06c690cd36d4398</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>reprise contrl</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c5182e2047601110a06c690cd36d4398</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-05 00:36:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        g_form.setMandatory("all_notifications", false);
        g_form.setMandatory("assignments", false);
        g_form.setMandatory("approvals", false);
        return;
    }

    g_form.setMandatory("all_notifications", true);
    g_form.setMandatory("assignments", true);
    g_form.setMandatory("approvals", true);

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-04 14:41:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c0d1fe2847601110a06c690cd36d43d8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>backup contrl</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c0d1fe2847601110a06c690cd36d43d8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-05 00:35:55</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GammeFilter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GammeFilter</name><script><![CDATA[var GammeFilter = Class.create();
GammeFilter.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'GammeFilter',
    getResponses: function() {

        var requested_for_id = this.getParameter('requested_for');
        var type_of_request = this.getParameter('type_of_request');
        var request_subtype = this.getParameter('request_subtype');

        var answer = "";

        var query = "";

        // requested for filter

        var gr_member = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');

        var user_groups = [];

        gr_member.addQuery('user', requested_for_id);

        gr_member.query();

        while (gr_member.next()) {
            user_groups.push(gr_member.group + "");
        }

        if (user_groups.length != 0) {

            for (var i = 0; i < user_groups.length; i++) {
                query += 'u_hr_classCONTAINS' + user_groups[i] + '^OR';
            }

            var gr_gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');

            gr_gamme.addEncodedQuery(query);

            gr_gamme.query();

            while (gr_gamme.next()) {
                answer += gr_gamme.sys_id + ",";
            }
        }
        // type of request & request subtype filter

        gr_gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');

        query = "sys_idIN" + answer + "^u_type_of_request=" + type_of_request + "^u_request_subtype=" + request_subtype;

        gr_gamme.addEncodedQuery(query);

        gr_gamme.query();

        answer = "";

        while (gr_gamme.next()) {
            answer += gr_gamme.sys_id + ",";
        }

        return answer;
    }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 23:13:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388</sys_id><sys_mod_count>71</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GammeFilter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-05 23:46:56</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:015ce314477a0110a06c690cd36d439a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>infoItemControls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading) {
        return;
    }

    var options = initOptions();
	

    g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);

    for (var i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", options[i].value, options[i].label, i);
    }

    if (newValue == 'employee_request' || newValue == 'delegate_request') {

        for (i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {

            if (options[i].value === 'ad_hoc') {
                g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", options[i].value);
            }
        }

    } else if (newValue == 'specific_request') {

        for (i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {

            if (options[i].value === 'ad_hoc' ||
                options[i].value === 'standard' || options[i].value === '') {
                // nothing
            } else
                g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", options[i].value);

        }
    } else if (newValue == 'exceptional_request' || newValue == 'quotation_request') {
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
		g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");
		
      } else if (newValue == '') {
           g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");	
	}
}

function initOptions() {
    return [{
            label: "Astreinte",
            value: "astreint"
        },
        {
            label: "Factur",
            value: "facture"
        },
        {
            label: "BCP",
            value: "bcp"
        },
        {
            label: "Prt",
            value: "pret"
        },
        {
            label: "Standard",
            value: "standard"
        },
        {
            label: "Ad hoc",
            value: "ad_hoc"
        },
        {
            label: "Perte",
            value: "perte"
        },
        {
            label: "Vol",
            value: "vol"
        }
    ];
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-08 00:47:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>34</sys_mod_count><sys_name>infoItemControls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-17 00:50:17</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b0c982a547320110a06c690cd36d4390</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>want_to_request_controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading) {
		g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
        return;
    }

        g_form.setValue("requested_for", null);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", false);
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);
        g_form.setValue("request_subtype", '');
	
    if (newValue == 'myself') {
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", g_user.userID);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", true);
    
    } else if (newValue == 'direct_report' || newValue == '') {
		
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);	
    }
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>17</sys_mod_count><sys_name>want_to_request_controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 16:07:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

    "use strict";

    return {

        setAttachmentMandatory: function(isMandatory) {
                angular.element("#sc_cat_item").scope().c.data.sc_cat_item.mandatory_attachment = isMandatory;

        type: "AttachmentUtil"
    };
})();]]></script><script_name/><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-14 01:06:03</sys_created_on><sys_id>b55e894047e70110a06c690cd36d4327</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>attachementControl</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_b55e894047e70110a06c690cd36d4327</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-14 01:14:27</sys_updated_on><ui_type>10</ui_type><use_scoped_format>false</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:994d6354477a0110a06c690cd36d4355</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>adhocControls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading) {
      g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", false);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", false);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", false);
        return;
    }

    if (newValue == 'ad_hoc') {
     g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", true);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", true);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", true);
	setAttachementTo(true);
    } else {
    g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", false);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", false);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", false);
		setAttachementTo(false);
	}
   
}

function setAttachementTo(state){
	g_ui_scripts.getUIScript('attachementControl').then(function(script) {
   script.setAttachmentMandatory(state);
});
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-14 23:00:04</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>100bb1d447230110a06c690cd36d4385</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>adhocControls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_100bb1d447230110a06c690cd36d4385</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-14 23:00:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>checkAttachments</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	if(!getAttached()){
       g_form.addErrorMessage("Attachments required !");
		return false;
	}
	
	return true;
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-18 21:30:28</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>551d4a6147630110a06c690cd36d439a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>46</sys_mod_count><sys_name>checkAttachments</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_551d4a6147630110a06c690cd36d439a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-19 01:59:31</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ui_script"><sys_ui_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description/><global>false</global><name>attachmentsControl</name><script><![CDATA[function getAttached(){
	//angular.element("#sc_cat_item").scope().c.data.sc_cat_item.mandatory_attachment = isMandatory;
		var len = angular.element("#sc_cat_item").scope().attachments.length;	
			
         if(len > 0){
           return true;
           }
			return false;

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_94eb066947320110a06c690cd36d430d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.requestedForControls</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>requestedForControls</name><script><![CDATA[var requestedForControls = Class.create();
requestedForControls.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getUsers: function(cur) {

        var choice = cur.variables.i_want_to_request_this.toString();

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', gs.getUserID());
        gr.query();
        gr.next();
		
        if (choice === "manager") {
            return "manager=" + gr.sys_id;
        }

        if (choice === "myself") {
            return "sys_id=" + gr.sys_id;
        } else {
            return "sys_id!=" + gr.sys_id +"^active=true";
        }

    },
    type: 'requestedForControls'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:39:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>94eb066947320110a06c690cd36d430d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>requestedForControls</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_94eb066947320110a06c690cd36d430d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-11 15:27:19</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_map_e2569b0547370110a06c690cd36d43cb
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_map"><sys_transform_map action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><copy_empty_fields>false</copy_empty_fields><create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields>false</create_new_record_on_empty_coalesce_fields><enforce_mandatory_fields>No</enforce_mandatory_fields><name>map_packages</name><order>100</order><run_business_rules>true</run_business_rules><run_script>false</run_script><script><![CDATA[(function transformRow(source, target, map, log, isUpdate) {

	var gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');
    gamme.addQuery("correlation_id", source.u_range_id);

    gamme.query();

    if (gamme.next()) {

        var group = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        group.addQuery("u_group_code", source.u_hr_class_id);

        group.query();

        if (group.next()) {
            var listArr = gamme.u_hr_class.toString().split(',');
            listArr.push(group.sys_id.toString());
            gamme.setValue("u_hr_class", listArr.join(','));
        }
    }

})(source, target, map, log, action==="update");]]></script><source_table>u_packages_datas</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_map</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-29 23:49:41</sys_created_on><sys_id>e2569b0547370110a06c690cd36d43cb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>map_packages</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_map_e2569b0547370110a06c690cd36d43cb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-30 02:02:09</sys_updated_on><target_table>u_gamme</target_table></sys_transform_map></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_script_db60f78947770110a06c690cd36d438f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><map display_value="map_packages">e2569b0547370110a06c690cd36d43cb</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	var gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');
    gamme.addQuery("correlation_id", source.u_range_id);

    gamme.query();

    if (gamme.next()) {

        var group = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        group.addQuery("u_group_code", source.u_hr_class_id);

        group.query();

        if (group.next()) {
            var listArr = gamme.u_hr_class.toString().split(',');
            listArr.push(group.sys_id.toString());
            gamme.setValue("u_hr_class", listArr.join(','));
			gamme.update();
        }
    }

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-30 01:43:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>db60f78947770110a06c690cd36d438f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onBefore</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_db60f78947770110a06c690cd36d438f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-30 02:02:39</sys_updated_on><when>onBefore</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>
