    var gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');
    gamme.addQuery("correlation_id", source.u_range_id);

    gamme.query();

    if (gamme.next()) {

        var group = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        group.addQuery("u_group_code", source.u_hr_class_id);

        group.query();

        if (group.next()) {
            var listArr = gamme.u_hr_class.toString().split(',');
            listArr.push(group.sys_id.toString());
            return listArr.join(',');
        }
    }

})(source);]]></source_script><source_table>u_packages_datas</source_table><sys_class_name>sys_transform_entry</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-30 00:12:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>3c4b1b4947370110a06c690cd36d4319</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>[Script]</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_entry_3c4b1b4947370110a06c690cd36d4319</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-30 01:26:03</sys_updated_on><target_field>u_hr_class</target_field><target_table>u_gamme</target_table><use_source_script>true</use_source_script></sys_transform_entry></record_update>

	var family = new GlideRecord('u_purchase_family');
	family.addQuery("u_family_code", source.u_pf_id);
	family.query();
	
	if(family.next()){
       target.u_purchase_family = family.sys_id;	
	}

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-29 23:17:04</sys_created_on><sys_id>2b7d87cd47b30110a06c690cd36d432c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onBefore</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_2b7d87cd47b30110a06c690cd36d432c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-29 23:17:04</sys_updated_on><when>onBefore</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_transform_script_21ed63c547770110a06c690cd36d43d7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_transform_script"><sys_transform_script action="DELETE"><active>true</active><map display_value="map_packages">e2569b0547370110a06c690cd36d43cb</map><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[(function runTransformScript(source, map, log, target /*undefined onStart*/ ) {

	var gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');
    gamme.addQuery("correlation_id", source.u_range_id);

    gamme.query();

    if (gamme.next()) {

        var group = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        group.addQuery("u_group_code", source.u_hr_class_id);

        group.query();

        if (group.next()) {
            var listArr = gamme.u_hr_class.toString().split(',');
            listArr.push(group.sys_id.toString());
            gamme.setValue("u_hr_class", listArr.join(','));
        }
    }

})(source, map, log, target);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_transform_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-30 01:32:07</sys_created_on><sys_id>21ed63c547770110a06c690cd36d43d7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>onBefore</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_transform_script_21ed63c547770110a06c690cd36d43d7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-30 01:34:19</sys_updated_on><when>onBefore</when></sys_transform_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_94eb066947320110a06c690cd36d430d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.requestedForControls</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>requestedForControls</name><script><![CDATA[var requestedForControls = Class.create();
requestedForControls.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    
	getUsers: function(cur) {

        var choice = cur.variables.i_want_to_request_this.toString();

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', gs.getUserID());
        gr.query();
        gr.next();
		
        if (choice === "myself") {
            
            return "sys_id="+gr.sys_id;

        } else if (choice === "manager") {
            return "manager="+gr.sys_id;
        } else {
            return "sys_id!="+gr.sys_id;
        }

    },
    type: 'requestedForControls'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:39:34</sys_created_on><sys_id>94eb066947320110a06c690cd36d430d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>requestedForControls</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_94eb066947320110a06c690cd36d430d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-11 14:39:34</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b0c982a547320110a06c690cd36d4390</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>want_to_request_controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
        return;
    }

	g_form.setValue("requested_for", null);
    g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", false);
	
    if (newValue == 'myself') {
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", g_user.userID);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", true);
    } 

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>want_to_request_controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-11 14:57:18</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>setCatalogSysId</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   
	var ga = new GlideAjax('GammeFilter');

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getResponses');
	
    ga.addParam('requested_for', this.parent_form.getValue('requested_for'));
	
	ga.addParam('type_of_request', this.parent_form.getValue('type_of_request'));
	
	ga.addParam('request_subtype', this.parent_form.getValue('request_subtype'));

    ga.getXML(applyFilter);
	
}

function applyFilter(response) {
     
     var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
      answer = JSON.parse(answer);
	
     var cat_sys_id = new URLSearchParams(this.location.href).get('sys_id').toString();
	
     var filter = g_list.get('article');
	
     var query = 'u_purchase_family.u_catalog_item='+cat_sys_id+'^sys_idIN'+answer.requested_for_ids+
                 '^sys_idIN'+answer.type_subtype_ids;
	
     filter.setQuery(query);    
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-14 01:20:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d1d1ba1647320110a06c690cd36d4355</sys_id><sys_mod_count>32</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setCatalogSysId</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d1d1ba1647320110a06c690cd36d4355</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-26 22:23:09</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Selected article(s)">69cf6e9247320110a06c690cd36d43c2</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GammeFilter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GammeFilter</name><script><![CDATA[var GammeFilter = Class.create();
GammeFilter.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'GammeFilter',
    getResponses: function() {

        var requested_for_id = this.getParameter('requested_for');
        var type_of_request = this.getParameter('type_of_request');
        var request_subtype = this.getParameter('request_subtype');
		
		var answer = {
			requested_for_ids: "",
			type_subtype_ids: "" 			
		};
		
		// requested for filter
		
       var gr_member = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
		
        var user_groups = [];

        gr_member.addQuery('user', requested_for_id);

        gr_member.query();

        while (gr_member.next()) {
            user_groups.push(gr_member.group + "");
        }

      if(user_groups.length != 0){
			
       var query = "";
		
        for (var i = 0; i < user_groups.length; i++) {
          query += 'u_hr_classCONTAINS'+user_groups[i]+'^OR';
        }
		
        var gr_gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');

        gr_gamme.addEncodedQuery(query);
        
		gr_gamme.query();
		
         while (gr_gamme.next()) {
            answer.requested_for_ids += gr_gamme.sys_id+",";
         }
       }
        // type of request & request subtype filter
		
		gr_gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');
		
		query = "u_type_of_request"+type_of_request+"^u_request_subtype="+request_subtype;
		
		gr_gamme.addEncodedQuery(query);
		
		gr_gamme.query();
		
		while (gr_gamme.next()) {
            answer.type_subtype_ids += gr_gamme.sys_id+",";
         }
		
        return JSON.stringify(answer);
    }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 23:13:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388</sys_id><sys_mod_count>64</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GammeFilter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-26 22:24:00</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GammeFilter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GammeFilter</name><script><![CDATA[var GammeFilter = Class.create();
GammeFilter.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'GammeFilter',
    getResponses: function() {

        var requested_for_id = this.getParameter('requested_for');
        var type_of_request = this.getParameter('type_of_request');
        var request_subtype = this.getParameter('request_subtype');
		
		var answer = "";
		
		// requested for filter
		
       var gr_member = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
		
        var user_groups = [];

        gr_member.addQuery('user', requested_for_id);

        gr_member.query();

        while (gr_member.next()) {
            user_groups.push(gr_member.group + "");
        }

      if(user_groups.length != 0){
			
       var query = "";
		
        for (var i = 0; i < user_groups.length; i++) {
          query += 'u_hr_classCONTAINS'+user_groups[i]+'^OR';
        }
		
        var gr_gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');

        gr_gamme.addEncodedQuery(query);
        
		gr_gamme.query();
		
         while (gr_gamme.next()) {
            answer += gr_gamme.sys_id+",";
         }
       }
        // type of request & request subtype filter
		
		gr_gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');
		
		query = "sys_idIN"+answer+"^u_type_of_request="+type_of_request+"^u_request_subtype="+request_subtype;
		
		gr_gamme.addEncodedQuery(query);
		
		gr_gamme.query();
		
		answer = "";
		
		while (gr_gamme.next()) {
            answer += gr_gamme.sys_id+",";
         }
		
        return answer;
    }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 23:13:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388</sys_id><sys_mod_count>66</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GammeFilter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-02 00:43:15</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>setArticlesFilter</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   
	var ga = new GlideAjax('GammeFilter');
	
    g_form.setDisabled("article", true);

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getResponses');
	
    ga.addParam('requested_for', this.parent_form.getValue('requested_for'));
	
	ga.addParam('type_of_request', this.parent_form.getValue('type_of_request'));
	
	ga.addParam('request_subtype', this.parent_form.getValue('request_subtype'));

    ga.getXML(applyFilter);
	
}

function applyFilter(response) {
  
	var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
     var cat_sys_id = new URLSearchParams(this.location.href).get('sys_id').toString();
	
     var filter = g_list.get('article');
	
     var query = 'u_purchase_family.u_catalog_item='+cat_sys_id+'^sys_idIN'+answer;
	
     filter.setQuery(query); 
	
	g_form.setDisabled("article", false);
	
}
]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-14 01:20:50</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>d1d1ba1647320110a06c690cd36d4355</sys_id><sys_mod_count>62</sys_mod_count><sys_name>setArticlesFilter</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_d1d1ba1647320110a06c690cd36d4355</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-03 21:31:42</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Selected article(s)">69cf6e9247320110a06c690cd36d43c2</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_c8f9b34e47c70110a06c690cd36d4375
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>saveGlobalForm&accessControl</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    this.parent_form = g_form;
	
    var ga = new GlideAjax('RequestAsControls');

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getAnswers');
	
	ga.addParam('item_id', g_form.getUniqueValue());

    ga.getXML(callback);
}

function callback(response) {

    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

    answer = JSON.parse(answer);

    if (!answer.as_manager) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "manager");
    }
    if (!answer.as_direct) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "direct_report");
    }
    if (!answer.as_team) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "team_leader");
    }
    if (!answer.as_operator) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "operator");
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 22:11:43</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c8f9b34e47c70110a06c690cd36d4375</sys_id><sys_mod_count>67</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveGlobalForm&accessControl</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_c8f9b34e47c70110a06c690cd36d4375</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-11 15:45:41</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_34d514f347330110a06c690cd36d4376
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Access controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", "perte");

    g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", "vol");
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('RequestAsControls');

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getAnswers');

    ga.getXML(callback);

}

function callback(response) {

    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");
	
	answer = JSON.parse(answer);

    if (!answer.as_manager && !answer.as_team) {
        g_form.removeOption("type_of_request", "delegate_request");
    }
    if (!answer.as_direct) {
        g_form.removeOption("type_of_request", "exceptional_request");
    }
    if (!answer.as_operator) {
        g_form.removeOption("type_of_request", "specific_request");
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-06 22:53:25</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>34d514f347330110a06c690cd36d4376</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Access controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_34d514f347330110a06c690cd36d4376</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-11 00:17:21</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:b0c982a547320110a06c690cd36d4390</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>want_to_request_controls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading) {
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
        return;
    }

    g_form.setValue("requested_for", null);
    g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", false);
    g_form.setMandatory("requested_for", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("requested_for", true);
    g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);
    g_form.setValue("request_subtype", '');

    if (newValue == 'myself') {
        g_form.setValue("requested_for", g_user.userID);
        g_form.setReadOnly("requested_for", true);

    } else if (newValue == 'direct_report' || newValue == '') {

        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);

    } else if (newValue == 'operator') {
        g_form.setMandatory("requested_for", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("requested_for", false);
    }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-11 14:53:11</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>want_to_request_controls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_bd9e46e947320110a06c690cd36d4368</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-11 15:49:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>saveGlobalForm&accessControl</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    this.parent_form = g_form;

    if (g_form.getUniqueValue() == '7246284947001110a06c690cd36d4389') {

        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "operator");		

    }
	
	g_form.setSectionDisplay("request_for",false);
	
	var ga = new GlideAjax('RequestAsControls');

        ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getAnswers');
		
		ga.addParam('item', g_form.getUniqueValue());

        ga.getXML(callback);

}

function callback(response) {

    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

    answer = JSON.parse(answer);

    if (!answer.as_manager) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "manager");
    }
    if (!answer.as_direct) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "direct_report");
    }
    if (!answer.as_team) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "team_leader");
    }
    if (!answer.as_operator) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "operator");
    }
	
	g_form.setSectionDisplay("request_for",true);
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-11 02:50:47</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fe03bd8547041110a06c690cd36d430c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveGlobalForm&accessControl</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_fe03bd8547041110a06c690cd36d430c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-11 02:50:47</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_b1186fdf47730110a06c690cd36d43ab
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.RequestAsControls</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>RequestAsControls</name><script><![CDATA[var RequestAsControls = Class.create();
RequestAsControls.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    getAnswers: function() {
		
		var item_id = this.getParameter('item_id');
		
		var variable = new GlideRecord('item_option_new');

        variable.get('01ea4ee547320110a06c690cd36d4341');
		
		variable.enable_also_request_for = true;
        
		if(item_id == '7246284947001110a06c690cd36d4389') {
			variable.enable_also_request_for = false;
		}
		
		variable.update(); 

        var answer = {
            as_manager: false,
            as_operator: false,
            as_team: false,
            as_direct: false
        };

        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.get(gs.getUserID());

        if (gr.u_report_to != "") {
            answer.as_direct = true;
        }

        gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        gr.query();

        while (gr.next()) {

            if (gr.manager == gs.getUserID()) {
                answer.as_manager = true;
            }
            if (gr.u_team_leader == gs.getUserID()) {
                answer.as_team = true;
            }
            if (answer.as_manager && answer.as_team)
                break;
        }

        gr = new GlideRecord('u_purchase_family');
        gr.get('24ef160c477a4110a06c690cd36d43d6');

        var family_approvals = gr.u_family_approvals;

        gr = new GlideRecord('sys_user_group');
        gr.addQuery('sys_id', 'IN', family_approvals);

        gr.query();

        while (gr.next()) {
            if (gr.manager == gs.getUserID()) {
                answer.as_operator = true;
            }

            if (answer.as_operator)
                break;
        }

        return JSON.stringify(answer);
    },
    type: 'RequestAsControls'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-06 00:59:19</sys_created_on><sys_id>b1186fdf47730110a06c690cd36d43ab</sys_id><sys_mod_count>30</sys_mod_count><sys_name>RequestAsControls</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_b1186fdf47730110a06c690cd36d43ab</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-11 15:22:20</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_e231241547801110a06c690cd36d4312
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="DELETE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>true</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>saveGlobalForm&accessControl</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onLoad() {
    //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
    this.parent_form = g_form;
	
    var ga = new GlideAjax('RequestAsControls');

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getAnswers');
	
	ga.addParam('item_id', g_form.getUniqueValue());

    ga.getXML(callback);
}

function callback(response) {

    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

    answer = JSON.parse(answer);

    if (!answer.as_manager) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "manager");
    }
    if (!answer.as_direct) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "direct_report");
    }
    if (!answer.as_team) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "team_leader");
    }
    if (!answer.as_operator) {
        g_form.removeOption("i_want_to_request_this", "operator");
    }	
	
	location.reload();
	return;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-11 15:31:48</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e231241547801110a06c690cd36d4312</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveGlobalForm&accessControl</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_e231241547801110a06c690cd36d4312</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-11 15:31:48</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onLoad</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:015ce314477a0110a06c690cd36d439a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>infoItemControls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading) {
        return;
    }

    g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);


    if (newValue == 'employee_request' || newValue == 'delegate_request') {

        g_form.clearOptions("request_subtype");
        addAll();
        g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", "ad_hoc");
        g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");

    } else if (newValue == 'specific_request') {

        g_form.clearOptions("request_subtype");
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "", "");
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "ad_hoc", "Ad hoc");
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "standard", "Standard");
        g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");

    } else if (newValue == 'exceptional_request' || newValue == 'quotation_request') {

        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");


    } else if (newValue == '') {
        g_form.clearOptions("request_subtype");
        addAll();
        g_form.setValue("request_subtype", "");
    }
}

function addAll() {
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "", "");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "ad_hoc", "Ad hoc");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "astreinte", "Astreinte");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "facture", "Factur");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "bcp", "BCP");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "pret", "Prt");
    g_form.addOption("request_subtype", "standard", "Standard");
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-08 00:47:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>42</sys_mod_count><sys_name>infoItemControls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-11 00:19:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

GammeFilter.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
	getArticles: function() {
		
        var item_id = this.getParameter('item_id');
		
		if(item_id)
		gs.setProperty("item_id", item_id);
		
		return "u_purchase_family.u_catalog_item="+gs.getProperty("item_id");
	
	},
    type: 'GammeFilter'
});

]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-19 22:38:17</sys_created_on><sys_id>9ae50d9047030110a06c690cd36d43a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>41</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GammeFilter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_9ae50d9047030110a06c690cd36d43a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-20 22:09:32</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

change_control var answer = []; var exist = false; if(current.variables.i_want_to_request_this == "operator"){ var record = new GlideRecord('u_purchase_family'); record.addQuery('u_catalog_item', current.cat_item); record.query(); var approval_family; if(record.next()){ approval_family = record.u_family_approvals; } var member = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember'); member.addQuery('group', 'IN' , approval_family); member.addQuery('user', current.request.requested_for); member.query(); if(member.next()){ exist = true; } } if(!exist){ var articles = JSON.parse(current.variables.selected_article_s); var articles_ids = []; for(var i=0; i < articles.length; i++){ articles_ids.push(''+articles[i].article); } var gam = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');    if (isLoading) {
      g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", false);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", false);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", false);

        return;
    }

    if (newValue == 'ad_hoc') {
     g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", true);

	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", true);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", true);
	g_form.setMandatory("attachments", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("attachments", true);
    } else {
    g_form.setMandatory("nom_du_projet", false);
   g_form.setMandatory("date_souhait_e", false);
   g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_projet", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_souhait_e", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("date_du_co_proj", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("nom_du_directeur", false);
    g_form.setMandatory("attachments", false);
	g_form.setDisplay("attachments", false);
	} 
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-05-14 00:43:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>fc98090c47a70110a06c690cd36d4339</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>adhocControls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_fc98090c47a70110a06c690cd36d4339</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-05-19 02:22:13</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Request for">8e8986e547320110a06c690cd36d431c</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.GammeFilter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>GammeFilter</name><script><![CDATA[var GammeFilter = Class.create();
GammeFilter.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    type: 'GammeFilter',
    getResponses: function() {

        var requested_for_id = this.getParameter('requested_for');
        var type_of_request = this.getParameter('type_of_request');
        var request_subtype = this.getParameter('request_subtype');
		
		var answer = {
			requested_for_ids: "",
			type_subtype_ids: "" 			
		};
		
		// requested for filter
		
       var gr_member = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
		
        var user_groups = [];

        gr_member.addQuery('user', requested_for_id);

        gr_member.query();

        while (gr_member.next()) {
            user_groups.push(gr_member.group + "");
        }

      if(user_groups.length != 0){
			
       var query = "";
		
        for (var i = 0; i < user_groups.length; i++) {
          query += 'u_hr_classCONTAINS'+user_groups[i]+'^OR';
        }
		
        var gr_gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');

        gr_gamme.addEncodedQuery(query);
        
		gr_gamme.query();
		
         while (gr_gamme.next()) {
            answer.requested_for_ids += gr_gamme.sys_id+",";
         }
       }
        // type of request & request subtype filter
		
		gr_gamme = new GlideRecord('u_gamme');
		
		query = "u_type_of_request="+type_of_request+"^u_request_subtype="+request_subtype;
		
		gr_gamme.addEncodedQuery(query);
		
		gr_gamme.query();
		
		while (gr_gamme.next()) {
            answer.type_subtype_ids += gr_gamme.sys_id+",";
         }
		
        return JSON.stringify(answer);
    }
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 23:13:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388</sys_id><sys_mod_count>65</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GammeFilter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_8c418016470b0110a06c690cd36d4388</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-29 04:35:48</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: user_criteria_47ae86ec47720110a06c690cd36d435c
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="user_criteria"><user_criteria action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><advanced>true</advanced><company/><department/><group/><location/><match_all>false</match_all><name>Item  visibilit</name><role/><script><![CDATA[/** Scripted User Criteria is not cached, and evaluated everytime, so performance is dependent on the script.
* Populate `answer` with true/false or evaluate to true/false
* The script is evaluated in the scope the user criteria is defined
* Don't use `current` in the script or populate the variable
* Don't use `gs.getUser()` or  `gs.getUserID()`, 
* instead use `user_id` which contains the user sys_id against whom the evaluation is happening.
*/
var userGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
userGR.get(user_id);
if(userGR.preferred_language == 'fr') {
answer = true;
}
else {
answer = false;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>user_criteria</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-08 12:16:34</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>47ae86ec47720110a06c690cd36d435c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Item  visibilit</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>user_criteria_47ae86ec47720110a06c690cd36d435c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-08 12:16:34</sys_updated_on><user/></user_criteria></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Matriel informatique">0f7bafd0477a0110a06c690cd36d4330</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:015ce314477a0110a06c690cd36d439a</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>infoItemControls</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {

    if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
		g_form.setValue("type_of_request","");
        return;
    }

    var options = initOptions();
	

    g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", true);
    g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", true);

    for (var i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {
        g_form.addOption("request_subtype", options[i].value, options[i].label, i);
    }

    if (newValue == 'employee_request' || newValue == 'delegate_request') {

        for (i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {

            if (options[i].value === 'ad_hoc') {
                g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", options[i].value);
            }
        }

    } else if (newValue == 'specific_request') {

        for (i = 0; i < options.length; i++) {

            if (options[i].value === 'ad_hoc' ||
                options[i].value === 'standard' || options[i].value === '') {
                // nothing
            } else
                g_form.removeOption("request_subtype", options[i].value);

        }
    } else if (newValue == 'exceptional_request' || newValue == 'quotation_request') {
        g_form.setMandatory("request_subtype", false);
        g_form.setDisplay("request_subtype", false);
    }
}

function initOptions() {
    return [{
            label: "Astreinte",
            value: "astreint"
        },
        {
            label: "Factur",
            value: "facture"
        },
        {
            label: "BCP",
            value: "bcp"
        },
        {
            label: "Prt",
            value: "pret"
        },
        {
            label: "Standard",
            value: "standard"
        },
        {
            label: "Ad hoc",
            value: "ad_hoc"
        },
        {
            label: "Perte",
            value: "perte"
        },
        {
            label: "Vol",
            value: "vol"
        }
    ];
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-08 00:47:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>25</sys_mod_count><sys_name>infoItemControls</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_b430fbd4477a0110a06c690cd36d43a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-09 21:57:39</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Dclaration Perte / Vol">7246284947001110a06c690cd36d4389</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:01ea4ee547320110a06c690cd36d4341</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Set stolen items values</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   var ga = new GlideAjax('StolenItemsControl');

    ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getCmdbCis');

    ga.addParam('requested_for', newValue);

    ga.getXML(callback);

}

function callback(response) {
	
    var answer = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute("answer");

    g_form.setValue("articles_perdus_passe", answer);

}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-20 01:54:10</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>5feb737747c09110a06c690cd36d4323</sys_id><sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Set stolen items values</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_5feb737747c09110a06c690cd36d4323</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-20 02:29:01</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_19a340c847d09110a06c690cd36d43c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.StolenItemsControl</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>StolenItemsControl</name><script><![CDATA[var StolenItemsControl = Class.create();
StolenItemsControl.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    
	getCmdbCis: function() { 

        var req_for = this.getParameter('requested_for');

        var gr = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci');

        gr.addEncodedQuery("assigned_to!=^assigned_to=" + req_for + "^install_status=8");

        gr.query();

        var answer = "";

        while (gr.next()) {
            answer += gr.sys_id + ",";
        }

        return answer;
    },
    type: 'StolenItemsControl'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-20 02:26:51</sys_created_on><sys_id>19a340c847d09110a06c690cd36d43c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>StolenItemsControl</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_19a340c847d09110a06c690cd36d43c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-20 02:29:21</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
